name: Operation Meteor Shower
description:
Join the Asteroid Army and destroy some solar systems in Operation Meteor Shower. Survey the target system in your Tactical View and determine the best approach to destabilize the orbits of the planets. Launch your asteroid into the heat of battle and take down your foes in the Asteroid view! Move onto the next system and ensure the success of Operation Meteor Shower.

Developed for the Ludum Dare 49 Game Jame. Theme: Unstable.

Design, Programming - Fred Schmidt (@seracrooce)

Art - Teresa Ellayne (https://teresaellayne.com/)

Music by Ross David Cooper (@ComposerRoss)

Sound Design - Brandon Wheatley

Voices - Chris McRae (chrismcraevox.bandcamp.com/)

Voices - Grant Joseph (https://www.instagranttv.com/)

Now playable in browser! Exact same game as posted earlier, just ported. (Game still available for download!)
